mdRecord.dcterms:title: Stethoscope
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: George Tiemann & Co. [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Binaural stethoscope with hinge, wooden bell, fabric-wrapped tubing, and ivory ear pieces. Marked on the bridge: Dr Cammann's [stet]hoscop[e] Tiemann & Co.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments and apparatus--Stethoscopes
